reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app collects information from users and describes the type of data collected.
reply.reference: During the use of Joye, we collect information that you provide to us, and use it to provide you a better experience. In line with our strict privacy policy the employee information is encrypted and is anonymised for any analytics shared. URL: https://joye.ai/privacy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects basic user profile information (email, time zone, unique identity parameters), analyzes users' free-busy time in the calendar without storing the content, and sends messages to users inside the Teams chat.

content: Basic user profile information (email, time zone, unique identity parameters)
Analysis of users' free-busy time in the calendar without storing the content
Sending messages to users inside the Teams chat

reply.analysis: The privacy policy specifies the types of data collected, which include basic user profile information, analysis of calendar data without storing content, and sending messages within the Teams chat.
reply.reference: The app declares the collection of data types such as basic user profile information, analysis of free-busy calendar time, and sending messages. URL: https://joye.ai/privacy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that personal data will be used only for the purposes outlined and in compliance with applicable laws. Users are advised to read the Privacy Policy carefully to understand how their data is treated and used.
reply.reference: We will use your personal data only for the purposes and in the manner outlined below, and in compliance with applicable laws...please be assured that we will use your personal data only for the purposes and in the manner outlined below, and in compliance with applicable laws. We request that you read this Privacy Policy carefully to understand our treatment and use of personal data. reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or request the deletion of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states the user's rights to request deletion or removal of personal data, including the right to object to data processing.
reply.reference: The right to removal of data. URL: https://joye.ai/privacy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app does share data with third parties as outlined in the privacy policy.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app may disclose user information to third parties under specific circumstances, such as providing requested services or in the context of business transactions or legal obligations.
reply.reference: If we are under a duty to disclose or share your personal information in order to comply with any legal obligation such as to comply with a subpoena, bankruptcy proceedings, URL: https://joye.ai/privacy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app may share data with third parties in specific circumstances, such as service providers fulfilling user requests, prospective business sellers or buyers, or in compliance with legal obligations.

content: Third parties in compliance with legal obligations

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions the circumstances under which the app may share data with third parties, including service providers, prospective business sellers or buyers, and in compliance with legal obligations.
reply.reference: The app may disclose your information, to third parties as follows: In some circumstances, based on your specific requests, we may need to disclose your personal information to a third party so that they can provide a service you have requested from such a party, or fulfil a request for information from such a party. URL: https://joye.ai/privacy
